title: Stratified sample for college major survey

content.description: As part of a demographic study, a college administrator needed to survey a sample of students from the college. From each major offered at the college, the administrator randomly selected <math alttext="5" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>5</mn> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> percent of the students with that major to participate in the survey.
content.question: Which of the following is the best description of the type of sample selected by the administrator?

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Describe an appropriate method for gathering and representing data.
